overview: Curtis VanWalleghem, MBA, BEng, PMP. Curtis has over 10 years of experience helping companies set and execute on their strategy. Prior to Hydrostor, he was a Sr. Manger in Deloitte’s Corporate Strategy Consulting Practice and co-lead of Renewable Energy for Deloitte Canada where he advised and consulted for some of the top energy companies in Canada and around the globe. His focus is stewarding Hydrostor successfully to commercialization through industrial partnerships, operational excellence, sound financial planning, global marketing, and product awareness.
